front.title: Imperial Blaster
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny > defense value.
front.lore: A BlasTech DH-17 blaster pistol. Uses power packs and high-energy blaster gases. Shoots bolts of explosive coherent light energy.

combo: Imperial Blaster + Blaster Scope Target at an adjacent site.
